remarks: Polynomial functions are a subring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
mpfaddcl.q $e |- Q = ran ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) $.
mpfsubrg $p |- ( ( I e. _V /\ S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) -> Q e. ( SubRing ` ( S ^s ( ( Base ` S ) ^m I ) ) ) ) $.
